summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the reassessment and reassessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1418, for the improvement of 4th Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard at Lane Street to Andover Street produced, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway thereon 40 feet in width, and wooden sidewalks 6 feet wide, on both sides thereof, as provided by Ordinance No. 15464, under Ordinance No. 32903 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
